casebody.data:
No. —, original.

Ex parte Hobbs, Commissioner of Insurance, et al. Motion submitted May 27, 1929. Decided June 3, 1929. Mr. John G. Egan for petitioners. Per Curiam:

The motion for leave to file petition for a writ of mandamus is granted, and a rule is ordered to issue returnable on Monday, July 1 next.
